system.effect: When triggered, causes all vessels in the system to suffer -30 to Detection for 2 Strategic Rounds, takes 24 hour to recharge. Can't be damaged or destroyed except via critical hits. Doing this in a heavily populated system may cause a commotion, but may also provide a chance to escape.
